MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 3:00pm in the CH45 postcode areas of Wallasey following reports of a fault on the underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:37pm on 12th February 2021.
